ing: 2 pounds skinless, boneless chicken breast meat - cut into bite-size pieces
des: "You get an impressive taste for such a simple sounding dish. It impresses company every time. The best part is that you can adjust the heat factor simply by using milder or hotter curries."
ins: Melt the butter in a skillet over medium-high heat; cook the onion and garlic in the butter until the onions are translucent, 2 to 3 minutes; add the chicken and cook about 30 seconds while stirring. Stir in the curry paste until the chicken is evenly coated. Pour the chutney and tomatoes into the pan; continue to cook until the chicken breasts is no longer pink in the center and the juices run clear, about 10 minutes.
